overview: Carter Woods is expecting his uncle over. Well, technically he's not his real uncle, he's his mom's stepbrother. His mom wants Carter to keep him company while he's in town. Uncle Christian Cayden has a request for Carter: suck his dick and treat his houseguest right. Brandon Anderson and Beaux Banks are in a stepbrother argument on whose turn it is to play video games.  They wrestle a bit and quickly the video game becomes way less important when other joysticks come into play. On Halloween eve, Justin Matthews is more into his stepbrother Trevor Ridge rather than his own girlfriend Jewel. So he carves a hole in the pumpkin and sets a trap for his stepbrother. Watch Pump-kin Fuck how both guys get busted getting naughty.  Jim Nasty is so happy that his mom got married and that he has super hot hunk Justin Matthews as his stepbrother. The guys enjoy a day having some fun in the sun before they take it home and take it all off for each other.
title: Pump-kin Fuck
